description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Ishigaki, Japan. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Japan Five-Star Beachside Resort on Ishigaki Island
hotels.description: Embrace Okinawa opulence with an escape to the five-star ANA InterContinental Ishigaki Resort, an IHG Hotel, the perfect beachside gateway to the natural splendour of the Yaeyama archipelago. Dine across seven superb bars and restaurants - including fine-dining omakase at Sushi Ishigaki, fresh Okinawa seafood at SALTIDA and global gourmet fare at Fireside Terrace - or grab your snorkelling gear and seek out the fabled blue coral of nearby Shiraho Reef.

seo.title: Hotel a Ishigaki - Japan Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Ishigaki, Japan con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
